content.rendered:
Projects Commercial

ACE YXP
SECTOR 25 YAMUNA EXPRESSWAY

ACE YXP, located in Sector 25 along the Yamuna Expressway, is a premier real estate development by ACE Group that exemplifies modern living, convenience, and connectivity. This area is one of the fastest-growing regions in the National Capital Region (NCR), benefiting from its strategic position along the expressway, which links Greater Noida to Agra, significantly enhancing accessibility.

The project offers a variety of residential options, including luxurious apartments and well-designed villas, all emphasizing spaciousness, natural light, and contemporary amenities. Residents will enjoy state-of-the-art facilities such as fitness centers, swimming pools, landscaped gardens, jogging tracks, and children’s play areas, fostering a healthy and active lifestyle. The excellent connectivity of the location, further boosted by the upcoming Jewar International Airport, makes it ideal for frequent travelers and business professionals.

Overall, ACE YXP in Sector 25, Yamuna Expressway, is a landmark project that blends modern living, strategic location, and high investment potential, making it a trusted choice for both homebuyers and investors.

Enquire Now

BHUTANI INFRA- ACQUA EDEN
IN SANCOLE SOUTH GOA

Bhutani Infra presents Acqua Eden, an exquisite real estate development located in Sancoale, South Goa, epitomizing luxury and tranquility. Nestled in a prime location renowned for its lush greenery and pristine beaches, Acqua Eden offers seamless connectivity to key areas like Dabolim Airport and Vasco da Gama while providing a resort-like living experience.

The project features meticulously designed residences, from spacious apartments to opulent villas, each crafted with modern architecture and premium finishes. Residents can indulge in world-class amenities, including a fitness center, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, clubhouse, and children’s play areas, enhancing their quality of life. Surrounded by nature, Acqua Eden provides a peaceful sanctuary away from city life, yet remains well-connected to essential amenities and infrastructure.

The project’s investment potential is significant, given Goa’s booming real estate market, making it an attractive choice for primary residences, vacation homes, or rental properties. Committed to sustainability, Acqua Eden incorporates eco-friendly features like rainwater harvesting and solar energy utilization, promoting a minimal environmental footprint. Overall, Acqua Eden in Sancoale, South Goa, offers an unparalleled blend of luxury, tranquility, and modern living, making it a distinguished choice for homebuyers and investors alike.

Enquire Now

CITY CENTRE
SECTOR Pi 1, GREATER NOIDA

Welcome to City Centre at Sector Pi 1, Greater Noida, an exceptional development designed to elevate your lifestyle. This dynamic residential and commercial hub features contemporary architecture, state-of-the-art amenities, and a prime location, offering the ultimate blend of comfort and convenience.

At City Centre, you’ll find a variety of upscale living spaces tailored to meet your needs, complemented by a vibrant commercial area that includes top-notch shopping, dining, and entertainment options. With excellent connectivity to major landmarks and business districts, City Centre ensures you’re always close to everything you need.

Experience the best of modern urban living at City Centre, where every detail is crafted for your convenience and luxury. Discover your new home and workspace in the heart of Greater Noida’s thriving community.

Enquire Now

OMAXE CHANDNI CHOWK
DELHI

Welcome to Omaxe Chandni Chowk, your gateway to an extraordinary shopping and cultural experience in the heart of Delhi! Situated amidst the bustling streets of Chandni Chowk, Omaxe brings together heritage, tradition, and modernity in a seamless blend, offering visitors a one-of-a-kind destination for retail therapy, gastronomic delights, and cultural immersion.

Step into our sprawling complex and immerse yourself in a world of opulence and grandeur. From traditional Indian attire to contemporary fashion, our shops cater to every style and taste, ensuring you find the perfect ensemble for any occasion. Explore the vibrant bazaars and alleys, where artisans showcase their craftsmanship in intricate jewelry, handcrafted textiles, and exquisite home decor items.

Enquire Now

OMAXE DWARKA
NEW DELHI

Omaxe Dwarka, located in New Delhi, is a premier real estate development that redefines urban living with its blend of luxury, convenience, and modern amenities. Strategically situated in one of the capital’s most sought-after neighborhoods, Omaxe Dwarka offers unparalleled connectivity to key areas such as the Indira Gandhi International Airport, major business districts, and renowned educational institutions.

The project features a variety of meticulously designed residential units, ranging from spacious apartments to elegant penthouses, each crafted with premium materials and contemporary architecture. Residents will enjoy access to state-of-the-art facilities, including a fully equipped fitness center, swimming pool, landscaped gardens, clubhouse, and dedicated children’s play areas, all aimed at enhancing the quality of life.

Omaxe Dwarka also emphasizes sustainability with eco-friendly initiatives like rainwater harvesting and energy-efficient systems. With its prime location, luxurious offerings, and commitment to a sustainable lifestyle, Omaxe Dwarka stands out as a distinguished choice for discerning homebuyers and investors in New Delhi.

Enquire Now

SPECTRUM MALL SHOPS
SECTOR 75 NOIDA

Welcome to Spectrum Mall Shops, where shopping meets excitement! Nestled in the heart of Noida, Spectrum Mall is your premier destination for an unparalleled retail experience. With a diverse array of shops catering to every taste and style, we offer something for everyone under one roof.

Indulge in the latest fashion trends at our boutique clothing stores, where you’ll find everything from chic urban wear to timeless classics. Explore our cutting-edge technology outlets for the newest gadgets and gizmos, or treat yourself to luxurious beauty products from our upscale cosmetics boutiques.

But that’s not all – our entertainment options are second to none. Catch the latest blockbuster at our state-of-the-art cinema, or challenge your friends to a game of bowling at our lively arcade. With live music performances, special events, and interactive experiences, there’s always something exciting happening at Spectrum Mall.

Conveniently located with ample parking and easy access from Noida, Spectrum Mall Shops is the ultimate destination for shopping, dining, and entertainment. Come discover the vibrant energy and endless possibilities that await you at Spectrum Mall – where every visit is an adventure!

Enquire Now
